page.title: 15Recreation.
page.content: Downton for 15 years and will soon be leaving for Dorset. He would like to create more space in the church and would like to use it for a variety of different events. He said that he would like more people to come to family services in church and worship with him on Sundays. {Recreation and Hobbies. Many people in our Class like watching television. We have many favourite programmes. We like watching 'The Young Ones' because it is funny and there are a few rude parts in it. Other popular programmes are 'Dynasty,' 'Dallas,' and ''Allo, 'Allo,' a comedy series about the Second World War. 'Dallas' is a serial about 2 Texan families who own big oil companies, the Barnes family and the Ewings. These two families never agree about anything.
